title: Data Analytics Consultant

Deloitte is a global leader in consulting, delivering data-driven solutions to transform businesses. Weâ€™re looking for a Data Analytics Consultant in London to help clients leverage data for strategic growth.

About the Role: Youâ€™ll design and implement analytics solutions, turning complex data into actionable insights for clients in finance, retail, and more. This role combines technical expertise with client-facing strategy.

Key Responsibilities

  • Build dashboards and reports using Power BI, Tableau, and SQL.
  • Analyze datasets to identify business opportunities and risks.
  • Develop predictive models using Python or R.
  • Collaborate with clients to define analytics roadmaps and KPIs.

Why Deloitte?

Work on high-impact projects with global clients. We offer flexible work arrangements, extensive training, and a commitment to diversity.

Benefits: Pension plan, private healthcare, 25 days PTO, and access to Deloitte University.
